price: 61. Nabiyow usun Qeebi cabba heenih wagarî fanah kelli iyyeenik, toysa atu kaa fan kelli ixxicaay isi caagid Yallal kelisaay kibal kaal haysit, diggah usuk ken maxcooca yaabbi ken abtoota yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: ۞ وَإِن جَنَحُواْ لِلسَّلۡمِ فَٱجۡنَحۡ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in janaḥū lilssalmi fa-ij'naḥ lahā watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
